introduction.lead: Comprehensive definitions of X's algorithmic signals, weights, and measurement methods.
introduction.body: This glossary decodes the 100+ signals that determine For You feed rankings, from high-weight amplifiers (+75) to penalty triggers (-80%). Use this as a reference for tactical planning.

rows: User replies to your post AND you respond within 30 min
User saves post for later reference
User replies but author doesn't respond
User views your profile AND likes/replies to a post
User clicks into thread AND interacts (like/reply)
User spends 2+ min in conversation thread
User spends 30 sec to 2 min viewing post/thread
User shares post to their followers
User watches at least half of video duration

items.title: SimClusters Match
items.details: Multiplies base signals by 1.5-3x if post topic aligns with user's interest clusters. Measured by: Your content categories vs. user's engagement history (e.g., tech posts for tech-engaged users).

items.title: Author Credibility
items.details: Multiplies signals by 1.2-2x based on your engagement history. High reply rates, low spam flags = higher multiplier. Measured by: Account reputation score (hidden metric).

items.title: Recency Bias
items.details: Exponential decay function. Posts lose ~30% weight every 6 hours. Measured by: Time since publication.

items.title: Media Type Boost
items.details: Video: 1.5-2x. Image: 1.2x. Text-only: 1.0x. Measured by: Post media type.

rows: AI moderation filter or manual review
User mutes, blocks, or clicks 'Show Less Often'

items.title: Community Notes
items.details: If your post receives a Community Note (fact-check), it loses 20-40% reach and damages account credibility long-term. Avoid by fact-checking claims before posting.

items.title: Follow Relationship
items.details: Posts from accounts you follow get 2-5x weight in your feed. Doesn't affect reach to non-followers.

items.title: Verified Badge (X Premium)
items.details: 10-20% boost to base signals. Paid feature, not merit-based.

items.title: Thread Continuation
items.details: Each post in a thread inherits 50% of parent post's engagement. Threads compound signals.

items.title: SimClusters
items.details: X's topical grouping system. Users and content are assigned to clusters (e.g., tech, crypto, sports) based on engagement patterns. Staying within your cluster boosts reach.

items.title: Dwell Time
items.details: Time a user spends viewing your post or thread. Measured in seconds. Thresholds: <30s (no boost), 30-120s (+5), 120+ (+10).

items.title: Phoenix Scorer
items.details: X's ML model that predicts user engagement likelihood. Uses transformer architecture (same as Grok AI). Replaces old heuristic-based ranking.

items.title: Shadow Ban
items.details: Temporary suppression where your posts don't appear in search/recommendations. Caused by spam flags or duplicate posts. Recovery: 7-14 days of conservative posting.

items.title: Reply Velocity
items.details: Speed of author responses to comments. Target: <30 min for max +75 signal capture. Measured by: Notification timestamp delta.
